# Wall of Greater Dispel Magic (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 16]], [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** A straight wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 234

*You cast the spell and a translucent wall springs up, its shimmering field pulsing with strong, malignant shades than spin and twist into each other.*

This spell functions like *[[Wall of Dispel Magic (Spell)|wall of dispel magic]]*, except that the effect is that of *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*.
